meanings.definition: To give a wrong or inappropriate name to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She often misnames her classmates during roll call.
meanings.sent2: The teacher misnames the school mascot in the yearbook.
meanings.sent3: The cat misnames the dog 'Fluffy' instead of 'Rex'.
meanings.sent4: The historian misnames the ancient artifact as a modern invention.
meanings.sent5: The detective's habit of misnaming suspects led to many misunderstandings.

meanings.definition: To call someone or something by the wrong name.
meanings.sent1: He misnames his favorite actor in every conversation.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide misnames the famous landmark on the map.
meanings.sent3: The child misnames the family pet 'Whiskers' instead of 'Spot'.
meanings.sent4: The author misnames the protagonist to create a plot twist.
meanings.sent5: The singer's nervousness causes her to misname the song title during the concert.
